Spiritual Guidance.name: Spiritual Guidance
descriptions: Increases spell damage and healing by up to 10% of your total Spirit.
Increases spell damage and healing by up to 20% of your total Spirit.

Spirit of Redemption.name: Spirit of Redemption
descriptions: Upon death, the priest becomes the Spirit of Redemption for $27827d.  The Spirit of Redemption cannot move, attack, be attacked or targeted by any spells or effects.  While in this form the priest can cast any healing spell free of cost and with 50% bonus casting speed.  When the effect ends, the priest dies.

Sacrifice.name: Sacrifice
descriptions: Sacrifices the caster's life in order to heal party members within $33847a1 yards for an amount equal to the caster's maximum health. And gives you a chance to being resurrected with 100% health and mana.

Faith.name: Faith
descriptions: Increases your Spirit by 6%.
Increases your Spirit by 12%.
Increases your Spirit by 18%.
Increases your Spirit by 24%.
Increases your Spirit by 30%.

Spiritual Healing.name: Spiritual Healing
descriptions: Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 3%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 6%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 9%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 12%.
Increases the amount healed by your healing spells by 15%.

Improved Prayer of Healing.name: Improved Prayer of Healing
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 15%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Prayer of Healing spell by 30%.

Inspiration.name: Inspiration
descriptions: Increases your target's armor by $14893s1% for $14893d after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.
Increases your target's armor by $15357s1% for $15357d after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.
Increases your target's armor by $15359s1% for $15359d after getting a critical effect from your Flash Heal, Heal, Greater Heal, or Prayer of Healing spell.

Searing Light.name: Searing Light
descriptions: Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 3%.
Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 6%.
Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 9%.
Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 12%.
Increases the damage of your Smite and Holy Fire spells by 15%.

Purifying Light.name: Purifying Light
descriptions: Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Holy spells by 50% and increases damage dealt to Undead or Demons by 10%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Holy spells by 75% and increases damage dealt to Undead or Demons by 15%.
Increases the critical strike damage bonus of your Holy spells by 100% and increases damage dealt to Undead or Demons by 20%.

Holy Reach.name: Holy Reach
descriptions: Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 20%.
Increases the range of your Smite and Holy Fire spells and the radius of your Prayer of Healing and Holy Nova spells by 40%.

Improved Healing.name: Improved Healing
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 5%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Lesser Heal, Heal, and Greater Heal spells by 15%.

Holy Specialization.name: Holy Specialization
descriptions: Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 1%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 2%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 3%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 4%.
Increases the critical effect chance of your Holy spells by 5%.

Holy Nova.name: Holy Nova
descriptions: Causes an explosion of holy light around the caster, causing 28 Holy damage to all enemy targets within rIndex=13 yards and healing all party members within $23455a1 yards for $23455s1.  These effects cause no threat.

Blessed Recovery.name: Blessed Recovery
descriptions: After being struck by a critical hit, heal 15% of the damage taken over $27813d.
After being struck by a critical hit, heal 30% of the damage taken over $27817d.
After being struck by a critical hit, heal 45% of the damage taken over $27818d.

Divine Fury.name: Divine Fury
descriptions: Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.1 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.2 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.3 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.4 sec.
Reduces the casting time of your Smite, Holy Fire, Heal and Greater Heal spells by 0.5 sec.

Light's Grace.name: Light's Grace
descriptions: Reduces the Mana cost of your Resurrection, Lightwell, Shackle Undead, Cure Disease, Abolish Disease and Dispel Magic spells by 10%.
Reduces the Mana cost of your Resurrection, Lightwell, Shackle Undead, Cure Disease, Abolish Disease and Dispel Magic spells by 20%.

Spell Focus.name: Spell Focus
descriptions: Improves your chance to hit with spells by 2% and reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 10.
Improves your chance to hit with spells by 4% and reduces your target's resistance to all your spells by 20.

Spell Warding.name: Spell Warding
descriptions: Reduces all spell damage taken by 2%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 4%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 6%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 8%.
Reduces all spell damage taken by 10%.

Improved Renew.name: Improved Renew
descriptions: Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 5% and reduces threat caused by Renew by 10%.
Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 10% and reduces threat caused by Renew by 20%.
Increases the amount healed by your Renew spell by 15% and reduces threat caused by Renew by 30%.

Holy Focus.name: Holy Focus
descriptions: Gives you a 35% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Holy spell.
Gives you a 70% chance to avoid interruption caused by damage while casting any Holy spell.
